p: 0.2 mL of optimized BSNEDDS was dropped by automatic pipette into 100 mL distilled water at 37 ± 1 °C, with continuous stirring for 1 h at approximately 500 rpm (IKA RT-5 power heatable magnetic stirrer). After several minutes of mild stirring, an intrinsic droplet size and PDI were measured by Zetasizer Nano ZS ™ (for setting parameters see Section 2.3). The Erlenmeyer flask with stopper was stored at room temperature and protected from direct sunlight until further investigation. Determinations were performed at 37.0 °C throughout the storage time (1 day, 3 days, 7 days, 14 days, 21 days, 28 days).
